title: Intel foundry business to make custom chip for Amazon, chipmaker's shares jump
description: Intel's foundry business has secured Amazon's AWS as a customer for custom AI chips, boosting Intel's shares by 8%. The deal involves Intel producing an 'artificial intelligence fabric chip' using its advanced 18A process. Intel is also planning cost cuts and restructuring to improve efficiency and profitability.
content: Intel's foundry, or contract manufacturing business, has signed up Amazon's cloud services unit as a customer for making custom artificial intelligence chips, the companies said on Monday, a deal that gives the chip maker a vote of confidence.
